name: rPET Performance Flex Cap
description: Stay active and eco-conscious with this 6-panel performance cap, crafted from 87% rPET and 13% spandex. Made from post-consumer recycled materials, the recycled polyester (rPET) is created by melting down existing plastic bottles and other sources to form new polyester fiber. The sweatband is composed of 92% polyester and 8% spandex, offering moisture-wicking properties. Featuring 100% cotton seam tape, this cap has a medium profile with a structured crown and pre-curved visor. The adjustable self-material strap with hook and loop closure ensures a comfortable fit. Note that the lining, sweatband, seam tape, and hook & loop are not rPET.
short_description: 6 panel performance cap made of rPET materials with hook and loop closure.
